segments.text: How do you like skiing , Pat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love it . All my life I wanted to learn to ski . Finally I took lessons last year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose skiing is easy for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , quite the opposite . I thought I'd never stop falling down . Then all of a sudden I started skiing much better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Do you ski often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Every chance I get . On weekends I ski all day long . Sometimes I even ski at night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . The ski slopes are well lit . It's really nice to ski at night . Why don't you learn to ski ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not on your life ! I know I'd break my leg
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be so frightened . It's just a skill .
segments.speaker: S2
